title: Science Teacher Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Mixed Reality Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive simulation education environment utilizing smartphone-based mixed reality

learning_goals: Learners can effectively manage five major conflict situations occurring during science classes through mixed-reality simulations
Learners can apply Cao (2022)’s eight teacher response strategies to actual classroom situations and execute them with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain at least three digital puppetry principles that analyze learner responses and provide immediate feedback in mixed-reality environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
